subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Sophie Gustafson’s stunning collapse and Karrie Webb’s short playoff miss opened the way for Seon Hwa Lee to come from nine shots back and win the Ginn Tribute in Mount Pleasant, S.C. Lee two-putted from about 45 feet for par on the first playoff hole, the 18th, then watched Webb miss a 3-footer. Holding a six-shot lead when the day began, Gustafson shot a 79 that left her three shots from the playoff.
